CommandDefinition.Name: generatekeypair
CommandDefinition.Description: Generate a new private-public key pair and add it as own identity.

Argument.Name: encryptiontype
Argument.Description: The encryption type (one of: RSA, DSA) of the key pair.

Argument.Name: keysize
Argument.Description: Size of the key to generate in bytes.

Argument.Name: passphrase
Argument.Description: A passphrase to encode the private key after generation.

BoolOption.Name: o
BoolOption.Description: If specified the newly generated identity will be the only valid one.
